Name: Anti-Spinward Periphery
Details: The Periphery is a region of space bordering and surrounding the Inner Sphere. The area opposite the direction that the galaxy's stars are spinning around the galactic core is known as the Anti-Spinward Periphery. The Anti-Spinward Periphery is home to major states such as the Marian Hegemony, the Lothian League, the Illyrian Palatinate and the Circinus Federations, as well as a large number of independent worlds.
